Desc.entry: Part of NHS Sheffield. Provides free confidential advice, treatment and practical help for any child or adult with bladder or bowel problems, including bedwetting, bladder and/or bowel incontinence. Clinics are run by continence nurse specialists and women's health specialist physiotherapists at a number of sites throughout Sheffield. Open referral for people of all ages. Training in the promotion of continence is also offered at all levels and the service acts as a resource centre.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 8.30am-4.30pm, clinic times vary, please telephone first for an appointment
